StageLevel0Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete values, rewards only if the current stage is 0
StageLevel1Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete values, rewards only if the current stage is 1
StageLevel2Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete values, rewards only if the current stage is 2
StageLevel3Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete values, rewards only if the current stage is 3
StageLevel4Reward: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete values, rewards only if the current stage is 4
InfectionControlReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Continuous unbounded values, based on change in total cases
MinimizeDeathsReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Continuous unbounded values, negative penalty for increased deaths
RecoveryRateReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Continuous unbounded values, based on change in recovery rates
